:: Nightlight :::

Nightlight saw that aerotaur's shape vanished in front of her, and 
suddenly she started felt weak she changed to robot mode and tried to 
use her com link to ask for help, but she coudn't she strted felt 
like morning when windlord put out her pod.
She ws alone and denfendedless inside the trees.
